clinical_study.brief_title: Effectiveness of Acetazolamide for Reversal of Metabolic Alkalosis in Mechanically Ventilated Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease Patients
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized Trial to Evaluate Effectiveness of Acetazolamide in COPD Patients Developing Metabolic Alkalosis During Invasive Mechanical Ventilation

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to determine whether acetazolamide are effective to reduce the length of mechanical ventilation in decompensated Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD) patients developing pure or mixed metabolic alkalosis.

detailed_description.textblock: The purpose of this study is to determine whether acetazolamide is effective to reduce the length of mechanical ventilation in decompensated COPD patients developing pure or mixed metabolic alkalosis.
